name: Clue Detective Notebook
description:
No ads. No gimmicks. Just great note-taking.

It's time to replace the old paper and pencil. With Clue Detective Notebook, you'll no longer have to worry about messy notes or running out of space. This easy-to-use app will tremendously improve your game-playing experience.

Simply tap on cards to cross them off as suspects and you're all set. For more advanced gameplay, you can keep track of any suggestions made by players and write down additional notes during gameplay.

Note: this is an unofficial, third-party app meant to be used as a companion to the board game and has NO affiliation with Hasbro.
